revision.comment: Added RAM model no. and amount.
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=PTV3000 |upc=606449085617 |asin=B00904JILO |is_manuf=No |type=computer screen streamer |fcc_id=PY312200199 |fcc_date=09/07/2012 |ic_id=4054A-12200199 |flags=HDMI |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=PureVu CNW6611L |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR-BC |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63DFR-PBC |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9374 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |802dot11_protocols=abgn }} ''Push2TV - Wireless Display Adapter''
[http://www.netgear.com/home/products/hometheater/media-players/PTV3000.aspx Product page]
{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=PTV3000}} This device appears to use AR9374 (AR6004 with a USB interface). A '''Wistron NeWeb''' P/N and "2012/07/06" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
